segment.source: Starting and Stopping a Recording in WPR
segment.target: Starting and Stopping a Recording in WPR

segment.source: This section presents a walkthrough of some of the capabilities of the Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) user interface (UI).
segment.target: This section presents a walkthrough of some of the capabilities of the Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) user interface (UI).

segment.source: Starting and Stopping a Recording in WPR
segment.target: Starting and Stopping a Recording in WPR

segment.source: This section presents a walkthrough of some of the capabilities of the Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) user interface (UI).
segment.target: This section presents a walkthrough of some of the capabilities of the Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) user interface (UI).

segment.source: On the Start screen, click Windows Performance Recorder.
segment.target: On the Start screen, click Windows Performance Recorder.

segment.source: To run the default profile, click Start.
segment.target: To run the default profile, click Start.

segment.source: To learn how to view and use other profiles, refer to Start a Recording.
segment.target: To learn how to view and use other profiles, refer to Start a Recording.

segment.source: Click Start to begin recording, or click Cancel to end without recording.
segment.target: Click Start to begin recording, or click Cancel to end without recording.

segment.source: On the WPR screen, click Save.
segment.target: On the WPR screen, click Save.

segment.source: If you click Cancel, no data is saved.
segment.target: If you click Cancel, no data is saved.

segment.source: Browse to the location to which you want to save the recording file.
segment.target: Browse to the location to which you want to save the recording file.

segment.source: Enter a description of the problem for which you created the recording.
segment.target: Enter a description of the problem for which you created the recording.

segment.source: Click Save and then click OK.
segment.target: Click Save and then click OK.
